items.title: Regularized Standard Deviation (Implementation)
items.content:
1655: :label: def-reg-std-implementation
1656: 
1657: $$
1658: \sigma'_{\text{reg}}(V) = \sqrt{V + \sigma'^2_{\min}}
1659: $$
1660: 
1661: where $\sigma'_{\min} = \sqrt{\kappa_{\text{var,min}} + \varepsilon_{\text{std}}^2}$ with:
1662: - $\kappa_{\text{var,min}} > 0$: Variance floor threshold (typical value: $10^{-8}$ to $10^{-6}$)
1663: - $\varepsilon_{\text{std}} > 0$: Numerical stability parameter (typical value: $10^{-6}$ to $10^{-4}$)
1664: 
1665: **Derivative bounds:**
1666: 
1667: $$
1668: \begin{align}
1669: L_{\sigma'_{\text{reg}}} &= \frac{1}{2\sigma'_{\min}} \\
1670: L_{\sigma''_{\text{reg}}} &= \frac{1}{4\sigma'^3_{\min}} \\
1671: L_{\sigma'''_{\text{reg}}} &= \frac{3}{8\sigma'^5_{\min}}
1672: \end{align}
1673: $$
1674: 
1675: **Example values** (with $\kappa_{\text{var,min}} = 10^{-6}$, $\varepsilon_{\text{std}} = 10^{-4}$):
1676: - $\sigma'_{\min} \approx 3.16 \times 10^{-4}$
1677: - $L_{\sigma'_{\text{reg}}} \approx 1581.1$
1678: - $L_{\sigma''_{\text{reg}}} \approx 2.50 \times 10^{10}$
